name: Stress ManagementÂ + Meditation
description: Reduce stress and live with greater ease through this tested and well-established mindfulness meditation program. Cultivate self-awareness. Respond rather than react to stress. Change habitual reactivity patterns. This class can help if stress negatively impacts your life or if you are simply interested in learning ways to maintain health and well-being. New or old to meditation all are welcome.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
